name: 365 Talents
description:
At 365Talents, we don’t believe that the only way is up. Sometimes, you start in one place and end up somewhere unexpected. Or someone introduces you to an opportunity that changes your entire journey.

That’s why our AI-driven decentralized talent experience platform gives employees the power to self-declare skills and managers the vision to uncover the unexpected, so organizations can move quickly and purposefully to chart a new course for progress.

With 365Talents, companies including Allianz, EY, BearingPoint, Schlumberger, Veolia and Societe Generale are embracing a uniquely employee-centric approach to talent mobility and skill development and creating a more democratic, inclusive and future-ready world of work.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Chart a new course for your people at work with a decentralized talent experience.
ShortDescription: 365Talents is Europe's most integrated AI-powered talent management software, helping large and enterprise companies transform into skills-based organizations.

Highlights.name: Increased mobility and project staffing
Highlights.description: 365Talents can help organizations to improve their ability to staff projects by making it easier to identify and deploy employees with the right skills.

Highlights.name: Upskilling and reskilling employees
Highlights.description: 365Talents can help organizations to develop the skills of their employees by providing them with access to learning and development resources.

Highlights.name: Aligning frameworks and driving strategy
Highlights.description: 365Talents can help organizations to align their skills frameworks with their business strategy by providing them with insights into the skills that are needed to be successful.

enhanced_description: 365Talents is an AI-driven, decentralized talent experience platform designed to empower employees and provide managers with critical insights into workforce capabilities. Positioned as Europe's most integrated AI-powered talent management software, it focuses on helping large and enterprise companies transform into skills-based organizations. The platform facilitates talent mobility and skill development by enabling employees to self-declare skills and managers to uncover hidden opportunities. Key capabilities include an Internal Talent Marketplace, Strategic Workforce Planning, and Skills Intelligence. These features support increased mobility and project staffing, employee upskilling and reskilling, and the alignment of skills frameworks with strategic business objectives. Leading global companies like Allianz, EY, BearingPoint, Schlumberger, Veolia, and Societe Generale utilize 365Talents to foster a more democratic, inclusive, and future-ready work environment.
key_use_cases: Aligning skills frameworks with business strategy
competitive_advantages: Uniquely employee-centric approach to talent mobility and skill development
Provides managers with vision to uncover unexpected talent opportunities
Aids companies in transforming into skills-based organizations
Europe's most integrated talent management software (as claimed by product data)
roi_benefits: Increased talent mobility and internal project staffing efficiency
Improved employee upskilling and reskilling capabilities
Enhanced alignment of skills frameworks with business strategy
Faster and more efficient talent deployment within the organization
Better utilization of internal talent and resources
Contribution to creating a future-ready workforce
Supports organizational agility in charting new courses for progress
primary_users: Employees (for self-declaration of skills and exploring opportunities)
Managers (for workforce visibility, project staffing, and talent insights)
HR Professionals (for talent management, workforce planning, and strategic alignment)
Organizational Leadership (for driving business strategy through talent)
